question: The Armed Forces of which country participated in the Republic Day Parade of India in the year 2021?
explanation:
A 122-member armed forces contingent of Bangladesh participated in the Rajpath at the Republic Day parade of India.
This comes as a part of celebration of the 50th anniversary of the 1971 Liberation War, by India and Bangladesh. While Bangladesh takes part in the parade for the first time, it is the third foreign country after France (2016) and the UAE (2017) to take part in Indiaâ€™s Republic Day parade.
